solution_line_template: Chelsea baked {num_batches} batches of cupcakes x {baking_time_per_batch} minutes each = <<{num_batches}*{baking_time_per_batch}={total_baking_time}>>{total_baking_time} minutes of baking.
She iced {num_batches} batches of cupcakes x {icing_time_per_batch} minutes each = <<{num_batches}*{icing_time_per_batch}={total_icing_time}>>{total_icing_time} minutes.
It took Chelsea {total_baking_time} + {total_icing_time} = <<{total_baking_time}+{total_icing_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} minutes to make the cupcakes for the bake sale.
